property.name: hbase.zookeeper.quorum
property.value: {% for host in groups['zookeeper'] %}{{ hostvars[host]['ansible_hostname'] }}{% if not loop.last %},{% endif %}{% endfor %}

property.name: hbase.zookeeper.property.dataDir
property.description: Property from ZooKeeper's config zoo.cfg. The directory where the snapshot is stored.

property.name: hbase.cluster.distributed
property.description: The mode the cluster will be in. Possible values are false: standalone and pseudo-distributed setups with managed Zookeeper true: fully-distributed with unmanaged Zookeeper Quorum (see hbase-env.sh)
